Text: Am I the only one experiencing trouble accessing the terminals in game? Every time  I try to access a terminal, the screen never actually pops up but I hear the sounds of it opening and the background blurs. Is it possibly because I am playing a pirated copy? Or is it a pretty common and well known bug?
Actually I just realized that it is because I have rearranged my button mapping and made O (circle) the activate button. Apparently it is a game bug. and i hope that Bethesda will fix it in a patch.
